meanings.definition: to convert into or express in the form of currency
meanings.sent1: She monetises her artwork by selling it at the market.
meanings.sent2: The company monetises its services by charging a subscription fee.
meanings.sent3: The magician monetises his tricks by performing at birthday parties.
meanings.sent4: The sun monetises the raindrops into beautiful rainbows.
meanings.sent5: The farmer monetises his crops by selling them at the local market.

meanings.definition: to profit from an asset or business opportunity
meanings.sent1: He monetises his real estate investments by renting out properties.
meanings.sent2: The entrepreneur monetises her skills by offering consulting services.
meanings.sent3: The cat monetises its cuteness by getting extra treats from the owner.
meanings.sent4: The teacher monetises knowledge by sharing it with students.
meanings.sent5: The athlete monetises his talent by signing endorsement deals.
